plot: Fragments of the everyday stories in a city. When problems that seem far remote affect everyone, some common people react to the events of their society and the world. Their voices get together to follow the same path.
title: El camino del caracol
plot_es: Fragments of the everyday stories in a city. When problems that seem far remote affect everyone, some common people react to the events of their society and the world. Their voices get together to follow the same path.
plot_en: Fragments of the everyday stories in a city. When problems that seem far remote affect everyone, some common people react to the events of their society and the world. Their voices get together to follow the same path.
